spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is maintained. However, several door orientations are incorrect compared to the plan (E3). Window placement in Bedroom 2 and the Kitchen shows minor alignment shifts.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall partitions are correctly placed. All rooms are present. There is a minor hallucination of a secondary interior structure near the entry hallway that does not match the floor plan (E5).

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is highly accurate to the proposed 2D layout, including the kitchen island shape and the corner bathtub. One chair is missing from the dining set.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent orthographic projection and clean geometry. Lighting is consistent and shadows provide good depth. Composition is centered and professional.

detected_errors.description: Bedroom 1 and Hallway doors have incorrect swing orientation versus the 2D blueprint.
Hallway entry area contains a hallucinated partition/low wall not present in the original plan.
Missing specific closet door details in the small storage areas.
Kitchen counter depth is slightly exaggerated compared to the walkway proportion shown in the plan.
